content:
I have to columns in a DataFrame that I would
like to calculate the difference in time between.

It contains values similar to the following:

ID | StartTime |EndTime
1 | 11:30 | 11:45
2 | 12:30 | 14:30
3 | 13:47 | 16:22

I could add a column to this existing dataframe
with the difference in time (in minutes). Could
you point me to the documentation also?

attempting something similar to:

using Dates
DF.SessionTime =  minute.(DF.StartTime - DF.EndTime)

Thank you,
